name: BRIMONIDINE TARTRATE

indications.text: brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2 % alpha adrenergic agonist indicated lowering intraocular pressure ( iop ) patients open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .

contraindications.text: one drop affected eye ( ) , three times daily , approximately 8 hours apart .

warningsAndPrecautions: brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2 % supplied sterile , white ldpe bottle , white ldpe nozzle purple hdpe cap following sizes : 5 ml bottle one carton – ndc 70069-231-01 10 ml bottle one carton – ndc 70069-232-01 15 ml bottle one carton – ndc 70069-233-01 storage : store 15o-25oc ( 59o-77of ) .
indications_original: Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2% is an alpha adrenergic agonist indicated for lowering intraocular pressure (IOP) in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
contraindications_original: One drop in the affected eye(s), three times daily, approximately 8 hours apart.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2% is supplied sterile, in white LDPE Bottle, White LDPE Nozzle with a Purple HDPE Cap in the following sizes: 
                  5 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-231-01
                  10 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-232-01
                  15 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-233-01 
                  
                     Storage: Store at 15o-25oC (59o-77oF).
adverseReactions_original: Neonates and infants (under the age of 2 years). ( 4.1 )
